drivers.name: foo2kyo
drivers.comments:
This is a driver developed for the Kyocera Mita FS-1016MFP laser printer.

It is possible that this driver will also work for other Kyocera Mita printers, but the author cannot test this.

Foomatic data to generate the PPD files is included with the driver, therefore we do not provide this data and PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site,

notes:
One of the few printers made by Kyocera which do not understand PCL or PostScript.

Thanks to Florian Demski for writing this printer driver for this device.

For now only printing is supported, but work on scanning support is in progress.

Please everyone who has a Kyocera printer or MFP which does not understand PCL or PostScript (or is too slow when using these languages), test this driver and report the results, preferably by a new printer entry.

Consumables/Refills: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum
